FuncDef: This command specifies HTTP URL of the CMPv2 server. The URL must be unique across all configured ca-profiles.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the HTTP URL of the CMPv2 server up to 180 characters in length.

Specifies the service instance that used to reach CMPv2 server. Values-service-id: 1 to 2147483647
base-router: 0.
Identifies the service, up to 64 characters.
